page.title: 19EYRE'S MOTORS
page.content: Mr. Bert Eyre started selling cars 30 years ago.At first he sold second-hand cars from his home in New York (near Boston).Later he changed to a Ford dealer in High Street Tattershall.The Ford cars come from Hartford Motors in Lincoln.Fords change their models every 5-7 years.The most popular car is the Ford Escort,the price of the Escort ranges from{Â£4,700-Â£7,500 } depending on the models and extras.Mr. Eyre also has a shop which sells spares for cars.Nine people work for Mr. Eyre in the shop and garage.They sell{100-150}new cars a year and they sell{150-200}second hand cars a year.The most expensive car is the Ford Granada at{Â£15,700}(new).Most of the cars are sold privately not as company cars. There are twenty-nine types of Ford cars.
